items.sentence: We made it to the top of the mountain just in time to see the sunrise.
Tom is worried that he won\'t have enough money to retire comfortably.
Tom didn\'t want any of his friends to know that he was a drug dealer.
Tom doesn\'t eat anything except the vegetables that he grows himself.
Tom doesn\'t have to study French. He can already speak it quite well.
I can\'t believe that you really sold that junk for such a high price.
I can\'t imagine many people wanting to read this book more than once.
I know how to solve the problem, but I\'ve been asked not to tell you.
Would you mind giving me a little help with some problems I\'m having?
He wondered how many times the sun would rise before his salary would.
